DevOps Project

Scalable Static Website with S3 + Cloudflare + GitHub Actions
Created by ANKIT PATIL

This project demonstrates a highly scalable static website architecture using Amazon S3 for storage, Cloudflare for CDN and security, and GitHub Actions for continuous deployment. When code is pushed to the repository, GitHub Actions automatically builds and deploys the site to S3, with Cloudflare providing global distribution and caching.

Deployment Workflow

Code Commit

Developers push code changes to GitHub repository

GitHub Actions

CI/CD pipeline triggers build and deployment process

Amazon S3

Static assets deployed to S3 bucket for storage

Cloudflare

CDN caches content globally for fast delivery
